TopicTitle: did they change the length of the runway of the island hangar? or wheel braking...

Articles.Content:
it seems it's a lot harder to land there now.

i tried a few times, i always touch down at the very start of the runway and still couldnt come to a stop at the end of it...

perhaps it's just FAR changed the flaps/airbrake calculations in their update... (and it seems planes loses speed in air a lot slower now too...)

Edited April 3, 2014 by lammatt
